definition.text: If the assets you wish to work with are not listed under Exchange Assets, you must add and configure them first.

paragraphs.text: In this section of the tutorial, you will learn to define which assets you may want to work with.

Each exchange may list hundreds of assets, however, you will likely be interested in just a few. Some automated operations may feed on your definitions, so keeping them free of junk is always a good idea.
